messages:
If you win this match, you will earn
 THE SILVER TROPHY!!
 Sounds good, right?

To win this match, you need to... 
 Can you guess?

No, no! You don’t need to score goals. 
 Actually, you’re leading by one!

But here’s the twist: 
 you can't score more 
 because an obstacle is 
 in the enemy’s goal :OO

So actually... your job is to defend. 
 Defend until the end!

Also, you’ve unlocked a new disc! 
 Could it be helpful?
